item_category: The Lenovo Tab M10 (HD) is one impressive family tablet. It is packed with powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon quad-core 2.0 GHz and supports fast connection with true 2.4 GHz/5 GHz WiFi dual bands. Inside lies an impressive HD screen and dual front speakers for immersive entertainment – impossibly contained within an extremely thin and light profile. Plus, make it truly family-friendly by adding Kid's Pack and Stylish Folio Case (sold seperately). This is one tablet you'll want to pass around the house.

review_text: Very pleased suits my needs
Unfortunately this product was faulty, but Argos refunded me promptly. Thank you
It's okay for what I need it for
I am happy with the product. Good tablet  It has excellent features and quite easy to use . Also to set up .
this was for work, great choice fantastic.
great tablet for all use , you tube , face book , games and videos

I didn't like this at first as it didn't have the back button at the bottom of the screen as my previous tablet did, it had an annoying swipe screen, I hated it but did eventually work out how to disable the swipe ok if you're good with technology but I'm not!  It's ok now that I know what I'm doing.

I've bought it about a month ago cause my friend asked me to find him a nice tablet that won't ruin his pocket and this one was a perfect choice. It's quite comfortable to handle for its size, has decent sound, doesn't crash while using apps or watching movies. Generally well spent money and we're both happy with it  :)

I bought the Lenovo Tablet a month ago and it is the best Tablet I have purchased.  I would definitely recommend this model to everyone. It is perfect 
*****
Argos is a great company I have bought many items for my home and would happily recommend to a friend. Items that I have bought have always been of great value you with high standards.
It has VERY POOR speakers and it doesn’t feel durable at all.
I read some positive reviews about this tablet so got one for myself. Great price , love it
Really pleased with this tablet, very easy to use, great picture & sound
Great value. Using the tablet to test some development apps on site and it is doing a great job
Excellent products and based on price tag I would recommend to all
Based on price tag it is really good products and easy to use for all. I bought three for all my nephew

I was looking for a quicker machine, this has reasonable ram and a reletively fast processor, I also wanted a trusted, unlike some of thosedodgy looking ones you get on other sites. lenovo is a known trusted brand and I am sure argos has more control than Amazon over the products it sells so went for this. The memory is a bit stingy at 16gb and is why it only gets 4 stars but I added a 128gb micro SD which took it up to a meaty machine. I like it. It looks good and feels quality
Okay I recommend it better than Huawei tablets they rubbish
I have got two of these Lenovo tablet for my sons.
I bought this recently & delivery to shop was excellent
Bought this a couple of weeks ago as a replacement,and it's fine. All the features you'd expect, feels well made,screen is good,sound is a tiny bit tinny but acceptable.
have experience of these tablets before, always good value with useful features
Bought this for my disabled daughter. She absolutely loves it.

We bought this for our 5 year old for his birthday and it’s brilliant! Does everything you expect and more, he has even been able to do his schoolwork on it via google classroom and meets! Parental restrictions are really easy to set up so he is safe to surf. He absolutely loves it and we are very impressed!
Bought as a gift, they are very pleased with performance
I would prefer the on/off button more distant to the button next to it.
I bought this a month ago and it has been a great little tablet.
This is a good quality product with an HD screen.  However, the more expensive Yoga Smart Tab looks to be stronger device.
Very fast on doing internet and downloading games
Bought this for 9 years old. Excellent tablet, ideal for his home work and some gaming of course. Happy child.
Lovely my table so much best by
I brought this for my daughter really happy with it brilliant tablets easy to use
Good hd screen but depending on what you use it for may need extra storage space
Great tab good price

Bought as a birthday present for 9 year old.
Screen is really big.
No lag
App store 
Exactly what we needed to keep son entertained
I bought this tablet when my laptop went kaput.It does all I need so might not bother getting a new laptop.Very impressed for a very reasonable price.
Everyone in my household now has one. True value for money.
Lovely size, great tablet. Only downside 16GB comes with 10GB plus of software otherwise would have scored 5 stars
Needed a basic tablet for browsing, this one works well. Battery life is good and charges quite fast too.
Absolutely fantastic little tablet does everything I needed it to do with great speed and great battery life

I was looking for some cheap second hand tablet to study when I came across lenovo m10 tab. Really happy with my purchase as it has pretty good screen size and does all the functions as any other tab in a fairly cheap price. Definitely recommend it
Well pleased with its performance for the price pad
Couldn’t really say my one never worked properly on arrival had to return it and as they had no more in stock had to have a refund instead so can’t really give it a review
Bought this as a gift and they loved it! Works great for what they need it for (browsing online & watching YouTube) very fast and light build. For the price it is amazing! Would highly recommend :)

Bought this to replace a Dragon K10 that died after exactly one year ! This Lenovo tablet is much better quality with a really good screen and excellent sound. I haven't given it five stars as it seems a bit slower than my old tablet but excellent value for money given the very reasonable price.
Great value for money. Good sound and picture quality
Ok for the price, but a bit slow. Sometimes freezes for a second or two. I'd probably spend a little bit more next time and get a slightly better spec.
Good tablet, reasonable price, lovely size screen. Very easy to set up for a child with family link.

Kept dropping wifi connection even though all my other devices are fine, the same happened with my girlfriend’s one. Other than that it was ok but I returned it because the wifi issue was too annoying. Swiping animations are a bit staggered but it’s to be expected for this price.
Looks good and is fast. However, the tablet runs out of memory very quick. Doesn't help you very much when you install a memory card and it is difficult to switch apps on to the SD card instead.
Bought for my father in law and he finds it easy to use, very clear. Great item.

Really good value and just what we needed. We got this for my nine year old to do his remote learning and Minecraft, but I'm considering getting one for myself as it's a nifty tablet with everything you're likely to need. Good size display and decent speed.
Bought this for my daughter for home schooling. Excellent battery life for school and games. Solid quality tablet and super fast! Really impressed.

I'm really pleased with my tablet, it's perfect for what I need and can also handle Microsoft Teams and zoom which is so handy for when we are working and doing homeschool. The screen is crisp and clear and it's so easy navigate. The only downside is the charger is very short, which can be a pain, that's the reason I have given 4 stars instead of 5.
All of your products are high quality! They are amazing! Would highly recommend
My son it's happy to have that tablet...very good quality
Slow to start up but ok to use. Lightweight  and convenient

Great value tablet for the cost, particularly as i got student discount. The only reason i havent given 5 stars is the memory doesn't appear to be great, I pretty much use it for browsing and facebook but have already had messages saying to clear some memory, which isnt really an issue if you keep on top of caches etc really. I would still recommend for the orice it's great.

Clearly states in the description SD card compatible but when purchasing extra SD card as memory filling there is no slot. Only a slot for sim card. I would not have bought a product with such small memory if you can't add a card. I called Lenovo and they confirmed this model is not compatible
Bought for elderly parents in lockdown. This tablet is very easy to navigate., even for novice users. Nice light and thin device for the price great bargain.

I bought this primarily to use for my art work and i am very pleased .The pictures are very clear i put my art subject item on it to copy it. The tablet was easy to set up and to use as well . Great value for the price done a click and collect from my local Argos.
Perfect size screen and great battery life highly recommended tablet

Bought for my daughter, very easy to set up,lovely clear picture and nice size screen!
Perfect!
A very. Nice product for the children for learning and leisure thay love the product

Lenovo is very good tablet. 
Very effective 
Very fast, 
Quickly browse any direction 
Charger very fast

Does it job 100 perfect 
Do doubt very efficiently 
Like the way it performs very well 
No problem whatsoever 
Enjoying the tablet perfectly
Excellent I love this tablet, is perfect for using I loved the cost which was really cheap also is really fast.
Great so far. Does everything we want it to
Fantastic value for money we have two in our house wouldn't purchase any other
Bought for Grandson who had broken a Samsung tablet. This was about half the price and works equally well. Easy to use and set up. A great buy.
Great for watchimg movies and playing children's games. Good for the price

Great value tablet.
Easy to use and ideal for any age.
Great purchace! smart looking tablet, generous size. Perfect for my children. Simple to use. Value for money. Would recommend
Good quality as lenovo does always
So good to have this..thanks a lot and it’s a good price.

bought this tablet to bring my dad into 21st century technology and away from his dinosaur computer. It has been easy to use for him after a few lessons quality is good and the fact i can upgrade the memory with a memory card is great for when he runs out of space.

Once adding a 32g memory card this tab was a great buy. But the fact that 8g of 16g memory is then by system updates is a big minus.
However the tab is Easy ro use great for my daughter doing her home learning and playing games
I bought this tablet for my uncle, and being a 10.1 screen size is perfect for him so he can see everything with ease. Very easy to use, great price. Even better as we got it on special offer.
I love it. Looks very sleek, stylish and it's very fast. My kids love it..
This was a gift for my husband, hes very happy with it. Has installed lots of apps on it and would definitely recommend
Bought this tablet for my nephews for Christmas and they love it. Very good for the paid price.

I bought this tablet just before Christmas, I'm really happy with it, long battery life and really easy to use the only down fall is you can't use it while it is on charge as it runs way too slow, other than that it's a great purchase
have used a Lenovo tablet for a number of years now .the m10 is faster than its predecessor the standard model so far would recommend it

We gave this to the grandparents so we could keep in touch and it has proven perfect for the job. Video calling is smooth and clear and it's big enough for them to use for generally internet browsing and shopping.
It was a Christmas present for my dad . He was happy with it ,had all he needed on it and more.
Both my Lads have 1 each so Bought my Mum 1 for Christmas, worth every Penny.
Great tablet, great screen size, daughter loves it for general game playing and TV watching.
Great purchase and very easy to use

Exactly what you need in terms of performance and quality. I was surprised at how great it runs, I was expecting something a lot worse than the Fire HD tablets, however, it’s a fantastic little tablet. I have given 4 stars due the bloat ware Lenovo added to this tablet - unnecessary apps/features I had to hide in the settings.
Great product, Partners son doesnt keep off it. Worth the money. Highly recommend
Good value for money
A high quality product. The picture quality is excellent. It ticks all the right boxes. I would recommend it to anyone.
Fantastic product great price.
Xmas presents for 2grandsons kerps them entertained for hours
I needed a new tablet for my wife who has parkinsons and the team really tried to help and succeeded .
Does exactly what they said it would, excellent!!
I got this for my aunt she finds it easy to use and fast and can do her crosswords easily
easy to use value for money

I got 2 of these to bring my parents into the 21st century, the screens aren’t as bright as an iPad , it come preloaded with google play as your App Store and a google link for internet access. The tablets are quick and have an SD slot to increase the memory which is great for mum and her gaming , despite them being resistant initially they are now both slowly getting used to them and use them daily. For the price a really good first tablet.
I brought it for myself as my other one was about four years old this works like a dream on the screen lock I use my face than numbers as my memory is going fast set up easy to use
Not as touch friendly as an iPad, but great quality sound and pictures. Battery life not as good as on some older model from “Lenonvo”.

fairly good product. great screen size however the apps installation seems to be quite odd.
Bought it for the kids and they like it.
The only drawback is that it is quite plasticky.
Bought as a gift for an elderly person - it's quite user-friendly and the screen quality makes it much easier for him to see.
Good service and lovely price, recommend it everyone
Really good quality clear HD can download most apps really great for homework. Would really recommend

Definitely pleased great purchase.
The tablet is very good the screen is bright. The battery is good. Definitely good tablet.

This is an affordable tablet, I bought this for my daughters birthday. She has a lot of games on there which she enjoys using. There is also a kids mode which she can switch between. It can take some getting used to. Would recommend as a first tablet or for watching movies and videos.
Great present for the children until one was faulty and had to be refunded so now my child is without a tablet ready for the school work to come in!
Good tablet with good specs. Comes with a lot of bloatware that can't be deleted though so I would advise buying a memory card at the same time.

This tablet is great for games and general web use.  Great quality and very big screen. I've also managed to drop it a couple of times after a few too many festive drinks and hasn't fallen apart  why waste money on an iPad or Samsung when this does it all?
A great tablet for my son. Excellent size great quality.
Brought for mother in law at Xmas shes found it easy to use good screen nice and clear
Bought for my cousins to use for school and also to play games. Seems to be fine for them. Easy to set up. No problems.
Definitely needs an sd card purchase too boost internal memory. Other than that its perfect.
They were worth every penny my grandson’s loved them
Very good quality for that price

Bought this tablet for my son-in-law for Christmas.
He says it's the best tablet he's ever had.
Very fast with a great picture.
Rapid internet connection.
In all, very pleased with my purchase.

Bought this for my mum for Christmas 
She loves it, the tablet is just the right size for her

Highly recommend it, great  value for money 
Wouldn't mind one myself
The tablet works well, it is surprisingly light and has a long battery life.

This android tablet is great for kids who want a larger screen to watch videos or play games. Nice bright and large display. Easy to use and many features and options are available. Kids mode is fun and easy to active.

We bought this tablet for my 89 year old Dad for Xmas. It was easy to set up and he will use it mainly for keeping in touch with family in NZ as well as looking things up and finding out new things. He is very happy with it.

I had already purchase this tablet for myself and really believe it's great .My wifes tablet had died and I purchase one for her for Christmas .Ruth is just as happy with the tablet as i was.
I'm 74 and have always found the process of ordering online for collection in store very easy .The instore staff are pleasant, helpful and professional great service.
Bought for 8 Yr old, for you tube, ticktock and games and all work with no problems. Great pic, and quick charge time.
Great value amazing quality
I am pleased with my new Lenovo tablet. The screen is clear and responds well to touch. The battery life is good and its easy to navigate around.

To stop the grandkids using our tablet, we have bought them their own. They already know how to use them, so was a simple choice really. Nice to use, easy to get covers for. Not forgetting grandad can sort out any problems :)
I purchased this for my sons 8th birthday. Brilliant buy can download all his games and do his homework.
Great purchase for the price , easy to use & OK for the requirement that I purchased it for
Excellent replacement for very old earlier version.  Easy to use and reliable.
It's a nice device and does exactly what I need it to do.
Tablet is a lovely design. 3rd Lenovo tablet we have purchased as cheaper than Samsung but great quality and performance. Easy to use. Would definitely recommend

This tablet is thin and light so it is very easy to hold. The screen is large so easy to read. The inbuilt memory is not very large but this keeps the price down and is expandable with the memory card slot. The best thing is the lack of bloatware which keeps it as close to pure android as you can get.
The tablet is very good the screen is nice , big & clear & its way to use
Great tablet for school age kids. Perfect for online lessons and homework.

Bought as a present. Have set it up ready and found it easy to set up.
Looks good and sounds are good. Perfect for watching films and playing games on.
Brilliant product ,good picture easy to use

It's good for normal watching films on Netflix or youtube I haven't tried gaming 

Overall good battery life and good performance
Ok good for what its worth.

A budget priced Android tablet which i bought for my wife. She only uses it for basic games, e mails and messaging so it’s ok for her purpose. The battery life isn’t great so if you can recharge it throughout the day then that’s ok. The build quality is not as ‘sturdy’ as most but, for the price it’s fine.
Haven't started using yet .
Best tablet I've ever had the battery last loads longer than my old tablets and bigger screen, and loads a quicker then my other tablets

So after trying the fire which if u use the child account has rubbish memory then we tryed the alba 3 times keept having faults, so we ended up with this, what can I say I wish we would have started with this it's amazing good battery life, its quick, nice quality screen and memory never seems to fail. I put a parent app on it which I control via my phone so my son is save online. (I also purchased 4 more of these tablets for the rest of the family) worth every penny
Very good product for the price. I have have an older version still working well, passed onto my son.
It’s brilliant easy to use and set up well worth the money and really light to pick up
the price was good my boy loves it very easy to use and battery last very well
Nice screen. Good performance for a tablet

Wanted to get a cheap but reliable tablet for our toddler. Having a android based tablet was very useful - linked easily to family google play accounts. Very easy to use, responsive and plays Netflix and access to tons of learning apps and games.
Is perfect for way I need.
My wife is very happy with the tablet and does everything that she needs, especially good for all the games she plays
Easy ordering & collection system.  Easy to use as bought for my mum who has only started using technology in the last year, she is in her 80s.

Bought this for my daughter to use when doing homework and to watch movies and videos!! Battery is really good , so far is performing really well, very easy to use!! Above all great buy for the money spent!! Really happy with it!

This tablet has a good performance for the price.
It does most of what an amateur needs to tackle.
I brought it as a Christmas present. So no idea how it works or looks like.

Very fast turn on /load up, a little disappointed that it doesn't have a memory card slot like it's predecessor but glad I can get a separate keyboard for it, just wish I could buy the keyboard as part of the tablet instead of separately. The internal memory is a little small for my liking which means I may need to buy the keyboard and a usb for the keyboard to help.
Easy to set up and simple to operate.
Fab tablet perfect for kids and adults aswell
We have 2 now, for a 6 and 9 year old. Great value for money. Bought a separate sd card and expanded the memory to 64gb.
I bought this for my daughter to get on line for college and it is perfect. Great size. Easy to set up. Perfect.
Had one of these for over 5 years bought a new one not took it out of box yet.
Bought as a gift - works well, clear screen and very easy to use
Good tablet, at a good price.
Price was good range and quick delivery and kept me well informed
Good battery life. Easy to use. Great price. Would recommend.
Great tablet value for money
One of the best tablets I have bought my daughter she's extremely happy with it so am I all set up on family link so she can't purchase anything without me knowing or putting password in.
This Levono tablet is just fantastic, great value all apps work brilliantly. Would highly recommend.
This is an excellent tablet for me.
Never bought a tablet before so bought this based on the reviews. Glad I did. Perfect for browsing the web etc.
Bought for someone to do basic stuff...absolutely fine

Tablet is most used for streaming live sport and online shopping mostly. Can not fault this product for the money compared to some of the other tablets about.
Would recommend.
Easy to use and a good size.would recommend
Bought for my sister for Christmas so unused so far but have same model myself so rated on that ,looks very sleek in black....

It was bought as a present so I can’t say much about it as I’ve not used it. I have read other people’s reviews and bought it as they all seemed good reviews. 
However it was easy to purchase with click and collect as I’ve not purchased anything this way before.

I bought e Lenovo M10 10.1in 16 GP tablets from Argos.  I had bought 3 similar product from another supplier but they stopped working and I couldn't get replaced as the product was not available.  I was forced to buy 3 from Argos who had this in stock.  The tablets are working well now and it is helping the residents in the care home to communicate with their relatives over Zoom.  These tablets seems to be really serving the purpose for which I bought and put into use well.
Excellent product if you don't have hundreds to spend on bigger named products

Tis is a great little tablet, both the wife and I are very pleased with them. The only down side is trying to get a cover to fit it. The wife is using her old cover, but mine will not fit, so my tablet remains in its box until the coronavirus is over and I can get out to the shops. She does use her new tablet every day, took her a little time to get the hang of it, at 75 she is not technically savvy, but now uses hers like a good un, sometimes 3 times a day.
Amazing tablet, Battery life lasts all day.. Small enough to carry around.. Brilliant gift..
Excellent service and quality product easy to use fast

Perfect for work
I really like

This is for Christmas so ive not set it up yet. Its for my 8yr old to game and watch you tube on so im hoping its ok for that. Looking at the spec, i shouldn't have any issues. Its replacing his amazon fire which was good but limited
Purchased this tablet for my son for homework. Great and easy to use. Would highly recommend for children in secondary for homework, good value.
Good quality tablet, affordable price, clear sound and good for everyday usage. Just recommend.

It does what we needed them to do, bought one for each of the children, easy to set up, easy to instal safety features for keeping the children safe.

They are really happy with them and had no complaints. Totally happy 100% thus far.

This tablet is useable but avoid the 16gb because you'll only have 4gb or so for apps and whatever else. The screen is pixely and the resolution is terrible. The battery life is passable but is somewhat lacking. I recommend the amazon fire hd 10, it is significantly better.

This pad might be ok for web browsing but that’s it , it lags like mad bought it so the bairn could play roblox and it couldn’t handle it just kept going back to the home screen soon as you start putting apps on it it runs so slow , had it one day and returned it
I am pleased with my Lenovo pad.  Ordering was easy and delivery prompt.  Happy purchase.
Works excellent, compatible with wireless mouse and keyboard which is like having a mini laptop :)
An ideal "second device". Has all the Android bells and whistles. We used for several Zoom meetings. Reasonable sound quality, it has superseded our mobiles as #1 wireless.
Needed a larger screen, and ageing mini iPad getting slow, the screen is excellent, not tried the speakers. Camera is good.
This was a birthday gift for my husband who is very "techie" with his Apps etc and it does everything he wants it too so very pleased with it

Needed for a cycling app to have a bigger screen than my phone.
Perfect for me as that's literally all I use it for however the storage was taken up very quick so in hindsight i wish I'd paid a bit more for extra memory storage. 
Apart from the storage I can't fault it.
Great picture and sound. 
Connected to my Bluetooth earphones hassle free. 
Battery so far is very impressive.

Had enough of my iPad it like you don’t own then after a few years apple stop supporting them rendering them useless. I got this for entertainment and email the sound quality is superb picture quality is rated 95% of apples quality. You won’t be disappointed also be aware it doesn’t come with a docking station as in picture but a good length usb lead and plug
I bought it for my little lad he he loves it
Good Tablet, nice price, quick processor, HD, really good sound for small speakers.
Brilliant little table well worth the money would recommend it
This tablet worth every penny it cost
Sleek and smart afb value.
This is the third Lenovo tablet I have bought (1 for each child) and I love it!!! Very good quality and performance!!!
It works almost as well as my husbands tablet and that cost three times as much!

It's a pro tablet due to the quality and design.
I love it
Brought this device for my son and so far its perfect. We have had alot of Lenovo products and never bee disappointed.
These tablets are fab. Sleek style and perfect for browsing and taking Zoom calls. Battery life excellent and definitely recomend
Very easy to set up for elderly relatives to use for online communication.   They have been able to make/receive video calls successfully.
Really happy with my new tablet.

It's ok good battery needs a cover as fragile looking easy for her to navigate no problems so far wanted it so of Google classroom is needed we have something in place .... luckily not needed for that yet
Bought for a 9 year old to help with homework. Needed a bigger screen than the amazon she had and needed parental control.. Very pleased. Good value for money

Bought the Lenovo 10" tablet as a replacement .
Like the larger screen and sound quality is excellent , haven't found anything to complain about
It was delivered fast and early and the tablet looks fantastic my son loves it.
Good value, works as expected

The screen is crisp clear. I use it to catch up on the news or vlog while doing the washing up or cooking. Because it's android I've got all my favourite and essential apps on there, I've taken off all the daily admin apps on my phone. 
Its also fab for the children. I can do all their homework given by the school on the apps. I can add safety features to ensure they are only watch or playing things that are appropriate for their age. 
It's a little slow, but I've definitely had worse.
Nice large size easy to use makes viewing easy and gaming easy.

Got this tablet to help my mum keep in contact as she needed to isolate because of her age. It was so easy for her to use once I set up all the apps she needed. Decided to get another one for my daughter for Christmas too.

The Lenovo M10 was a gift for my wife when her old tablet finally died. I was on a limited budget so price was a big factor and also availability. We ordered online and click and collected from our Argos branch in Yeovil, even with all the Covid-19 restrictions in place it was still easy.
The M10 worked straight out of the box as the battery was partly charged, my wife tells me it's a lot faster than her old one and more stable, doesn't keep freezing or need restarting, Happy wife= happy me
Very good for value would definitely recommend for to anyone level thinking about buying a table
Bought it for a christmas present for my grandson.  I have had this make of tablet before it is durable and perfect for children.
I'm pleased with this tablet, although already hitting problems with memory. Apps need a lot of storage these days.
Very nice design,  very good battery life and nice big display
Really good tablet for the price range. Does what I need it to.
Experience of previously purchased tablet.
Good value for a cheap priced tablet
it is very good value for money and my daughter very happy to have this
A good value, nicely sized tablet. The battery life is fantastic and im really pleased with this purchase.
Cannot fault it so far
Lovely little tablet, clear display, all works well for a good price.

bought for my mother for christmas i already have one of these has a very long battery life and so far its lasted 4 years with no problems
my son has the 7" version and thats also into its 3rd year of being abused 
if you need a tablet get one of these , far superior to samsungs etc at a fraction of the cost
perfect for me vsry good price

Great entry level tablet, easy to set up and use. Great screen and sound for the price bracket.
great for web browsing and emails

It performs well for the price it’s somes a bit slow and freezes but on the whole it’s not bad, I’m able to watch movies with out any interruptions, the battery life is good, very portable and it was easy to set up. It does what it says it does on the label, I’m quite satisfied.
I bought it for my 7 years old son to do his school work on it.He’s very happy with the purchase.Battery life is good.
Bought for my daughter for school work, works great and battery life is good too.plays games all the time too.

ok for watching vids on youtube ,you will have too get a sd card as most of the storage
is filled up by the operating system ,purchased for my little one ,its what you would expect 
for the price.

Andriod o/s only favour the manufacturer. being free, and alowing the manufacturer to adapt it to suit for example amazon locks out most google apps, and use there own apps some of which they charge for!
very good product ,design.its fast and battery its good depends how you use it
Good tablet quite fast loading ,had to put a 32g memory card in because the memory fills up quick when you download more apps. But overall very good.
i bought this tablet for my daughter,she can play all the latest games on there and is very easy for her to use,

Bought this for my 70 year old mother.  Her previous tablet broke and at first she was reluctant to have a new one as she was worried she would not be able to learn how to use it.  Well, Just switched it on and away she went with it. Very easy to set up, great camera and nice and light and slim.
A fabulous tablet, for a very great price. Could recommended it, to anybody.

Excellent screen quality. Sound volume a bit low through headphones, fine with a bluetooth speaker - I use it as a kitchen TV.

as usual you need to spend time turning off things you don't want; hit a problem with an irrritating flashing LED and couldn't find the setting. Argos help is useless, Lenovo can only be contacted via twitter but got a quick answer that way. Supplied 'manual' is also useless.

it does go slow at times and apps can freeze but that's tech for you. Let's hope it lasts.

Excellent little tool and very quick and easy to get set up. 
Seems to be working well and really pleased for the price.
I got this for my son who's 4 and is extremely happy playing his games on tablet. its worth getting.
excellent its my 3rd i will always buy this product
Tablet easy to use , light to hold fast working
Bought for my sons 8th birthday, he absolutely loves it.
Perfect for my sons needs. Works fast,very happy with the price
amazing picture quality long battery life easy to hold

These tablets will provide a lifeline to people without any digital technology during Covid-19. It will allow them to keep in touch with other members of our support group.  Great price. We chose this type due to the Good screen size so easy to read and use Particularly  for  the older generations to use.
Great tab  Great value for money.
My son loves it ive bought one for myself
Really good value for money. Very fast and looks very sleek. I would recommend getting a case for it as it's that thin it easily slips out of your hand. Very pleased.
Used mainly for social media, games and netflix. Brilliant, light and slim. Hapoy with my purchase
Easy to use a good brand
Excellent Tablet, does what it says in the advert
Good value for money, connects easily to WiFi and easy to put apps on and make video calling in minutes. Very user friendly - given to parents to use during pandemic.
at least 10 characters

This was bought for an autistic child as her ipad decided to do an update & made things incompatible with the apps she had. Got this the same day so she still had a tablet to wake up to next day. She loves this new tablet & so does her mummy as she was freaking out when the ipad wouldn't let her play certain apps. We have 1 happy little girl now.
Brought to replace lenovo E series tablet.. This new one seems faster and is a lot lighter too.. My daughter well happy

My Lenovo M10 is great, it has a nice 10.1 HD screen that is clear and vibrant. The Snapdragon processor runs all my apps, videos and games flawlessly. I can't recommend Lenovo enough. The M10 has everything and more for today's modern lifestyle.
item is spot on had no problems at all
Vet handy tablet and easy to use

It’s a great little tablet. 
It’s cheap and user friendly. Has great functions

Got this for in-laws. Does less demanding work just fine. No problems. 2nd purchase. Got it about a year ago for son age 7. No slow down, decent battery life, YouTube Kids and light weight games fine.
Brilliant tablet for size. Very responsive touch screen,not too sensitive like others. Battery life seems very good and was easy to set up,again unlike others. Very pleased with it.
This item is quite good quality for the price. I like Lenovo products and have used them for many years. I find them reliable.
Nice style and easy to work.
I'm very happy with staff what I ordered from Argos.
great customer service. easy to order online and even easier to pick up in store. great tablet for the money, money well spent in my view
I bought this item because my previous was unrepairable and i fpund it a lot faster and better security on italso its alot faster then my previous one
I am very pleased with my tablet and it is better than I expected it would be.
A good product. Good price. Easy to use which is the most important issue for the user. I would recommend this tablet.
This was an upgrade to my previous tablet which I had had for a while and was slow.  The Lenovo is fast and does what it says on the tin so to speak.
very happy with the performance for what it's used for

Impressed with the tablet, functions well and suits the needs I require. However, I am very disappointed that Netflix and Amazon Prime are not supported in HD, especially Netflix which is already preinstalled on the tablet. This is a shame as the tablet has been advertised as being HD compatibly and to then discover this is not the case for certain streaming outlets was a disappointing discovering.
all good thanks argos
Too early to give a proper review. Bought for my father in law. His first tablet. So far so good.
Traded up from the E10 as the audio was terrible. Very happy with the M10.
Good tablet for watching my football

It's not as fast or as sleek as an ipad or samsung but for the money what more do you want. Fast and smooth enough for all but the most demanding apps. You'll love facebook and youtube on it. You might not enjoy photoshop quite so much.
Bought for my daughter and she love it
Ok for basic functions.  Good value for money
This is a great price and a great bit of kit lightweight good battery life
Very user friendly. Value for money

I bought this to go in our summerhouse. 
It's perfect. No problems connecting to WIFI, easy to set up.
Been watching Corrie and a few films!
Picture is really clear & sharp, sound is amazing! Storage is limited, but can be expanded with a memory card so it's not really an issue. I'm so pleased with this purchase. It's exactly what I needed and at a bargain price!
Really happy x
slim line design easy understanding take anywhere dose what it says in advertisement on line purchase happy customer

My granddaughter uses  it every day,  has the odd glitch but she says it's great. Easy to use and good graphics. Down side is the battery could last a little longer, but uses it a lot on line So battery life won't be great.  But 4 to 5 hours is long enough to stare at a screen. So it gives her an excuse to put it down. That can't be a bad thing. Otherwise very happy with the purchase and i would by again .
Simple to use, was bought as an upgrade for an older version
Good tablet Fairly easy to use Does all that is required of it
It's legible simple to operate and responsive
Does what it says on the box at an excellent price.
bought for son partner great quality memory too small so put bigger in for games battery good too
Very low memory if you want to install games
Very fast and ticks all the boxes, only downside is it too easy to unintentionally activate the buttons on the lower edge of the screen, otherwise brilliant in all respects.
Purchased for just over a 100 pounds. Excellent quality product. Set up was easy. Very good battery life. Definitely would recommend.
The tablet works perfectly,  I don't have any issue with it since i bought it

Poor Performance
Not worth the money paid, STAY AWAY 
pay more for better performance

The tablet was very easy to set up and was a perfect gift for my elderly mum who has enjoyed learning how to use it. The screen is a good size, the keyboard is easy to use and the tablet is compact, stylish and lightweight. I am very pleased with this product.
I was quite happy with the Lenovo tablet. The battery may have lasted longer. Otherwise, the answer to that valuable rally.

Was in Hospital for a few weeks, my wife bought this to ease boredom. Brilliant for what I want it for. Just a few games social network terrific. But if I got one again I would go for the bigger memory 32gb .  The 16g  a lot is taken up by apps already installed.
Saying that I have not looked into installing extra mem card. Worth looking into it. 
ie. Will it help much,for the extra cost of card compaired to cost of the 32g model. Overall I am happy with it.
Easy to use has Google,that's what I wanted it for.csn watch my programs on it.
Received my Lenovo table very happy with this product
Nice priced tablet..easy to order..only downside is that the battery light blinks when using and can be irritating!..tech guys don't seem to know what this is..!!

I bought this tablet for my daughter. Very happy with it great battery life. Screen quality is great and very good sound. Its used for all sort of things from games, film music to drawing. Would recommend.
Excellent product does the job
Great value ,easy to use,and and all round great tablet
Easy to use and great charger
Great tablet, switch from ipads for both kids. We can all work it with ease and saved money in the process.

Bought for my grandma to use to access emails etc - perfect if that is all you require! Not a top spec product, but wasn't expecting one. Does the job I needed of it. Isn't able to access a particular banking app which was annoying, but cannot be sure if that is down to the product or the app so won't hold it against the tablet!
Great tablet, easy to set up and easy to use
Battery life is pretty impressive,  fairly quick to charge. Overall for a budget priced tablet I'm very pleased.

Great little tablet apart from voice recognition. Boots up and responds instantly but when it comes to voice recognition it is all over the place, bringing up words that bear no relation to what has been said. This compared to an older 8 inch Lenovo tablet which recognizes my voice 95% of the time.
Does exactly what it says at a good price.
My son loves his new tablet it looks good and runs fast would definitely recommend it to other people
Good tablet, especially the price. Can be a little sluggish, and slow to charge, but good battery life and nice big bright screen.
I purchased this Lenovo M10 tablet for my 10yr old daughter, and she absolutely loves it . The battery life is brilliant and the picture and sound quality. Would definitely buy again!

Great price, excellent product. 
Great and friendly staff. Service fast!
Fantastic to use nice and easy.

We wanted a cheap android tablet to use as part of our business. We use this as an ordering device in a cafe and it's brilliant. The battery lasts for the duration that we require, it connects easily to the internet and also we use the Bluetooth all day to link a cars machine. We use it to browse the internet also and it's pretty quick. We haven't had any issues with any of the apps that we use. The screen is large and it's quite durable. It's not the lightest but I prefer that from a tablet.

Was very pleased with my previous Lenovo tablet, so decided to upgrade to a later model.
Not disappointed with my decision. This tablet is very fast, has great speakers and the picture quality is very good. The fact you can also increase storage means I can download so much more than on the previous version. 
Great tablet for the money. Very pleased.

Value for money, good battery life, fast charging fast and easy to use - Downside for arthritic pensioner like me is getting used to the size after a 7" tablet - Upside is that it's easy to read the sharp natural coloured screen - Recommend buying SD card to enlarge the memory - Really pleased
Purchased this tablet for my wife,who had never used one before,after going through the basic use with her,now there’s no stopping her
not 1 bad thing to say about the tablet.excellent in all aspects of use
Really good product, using for games only though

Great tab for the kids or parents. Easy to use and cant do anything  to wrong. Camera takes a lovely photo with good clarity and colour. Great for books and cartoons. For me the image response wasn't great on movies and picture often pixelated. It is lightweight and easy to handle. The battery takes a long time to charge. It's best feature has to be the multiple users and the kids can have their own account without messing mine up. A great product  from a great brand.

Smart looking tablet, that is easy to set up and use. 
Pre installed apps on home screen to help use the tablet
Easy to use and move about the tablet
Battery is long lasting and easy to charge
Great tablet for children or adults

This tablet is of fantastic build quality, solid and sturdy screen & frame with superb sound & picture detail. It is thin and light so makes handling it easy and comfortable which is always a plus.

I haven't noticed any lag in typing with the keyboard and it's load speeds are extremely quick. It has a good quality camera, Dolby Audio front facing speakers & Dual Band WiFi capability.

A terrific tablet I'd recommend to anyone!

This is is lightweight bight and sleek the colours a bright and beautiful and the sound quality is great easy use internet access and set up however downloading and closing apps was impossible the camera quality is dreadful between the three of us very tech savvy people none of us could get on with it my daughter was so excited to use it and after finding it lacks simple technical qualities she hasn’t bothered with it since I wouldn’t personally recommend this it’s very frustrating to use

It's okay. 
Pros: picture quality and sound quality are good. 
Nice size for travelling.
Battery life appears to be quite good. 

Cons: feels cheap - slightly bendable, annoying vibration when touching the screen.
Feels like it would shatter/ break very easily. 
Not always very responsive to touch. 

Overall: Fine if you want something that does the job but is certainly not all singing and dancing.

This tablet is a good all round entry level tablet and good value for money. 
Although not Full HD the display is clear and bright enough to enjoy watching movies complimented by a very decent pair of stereo front firing speakers delivering good sound quality. 
Given that it is an entry tablet, the slightly sluggish response is expected. 
Battery life is a strong point. My grandchildren (4 + 6 - couldnt put it down!) have depleted it several times, lasting about 6 hours of life. 
Easy setup

Wow I love this tablet. It set up in minutes unlike my iPad which was an hour plus. Apps download in 30 seconds. Cameras are great and it’s fast. Picture quality is really good and the tablet is so light compared to the iPad. I’d thoroughly recommend this product.

Setup was incredibly easy, there were prompts throughout and a good explanation of what each stage was.
I think this would be a great 1st tablet (both for adults and children). It was extremely easy to navigate, light to hold and the graphics were bold and clear.
I was happy to see that there was a parental controls and kids mode section.
There is an option to use a memory card with the tablet if you reach storage limit, it is also a very good price for what you get.

Great piece of tech for the price, very sensitive , face recognition, fast speed, brilliant sound, and fantastic picture quality, ideal for youngsters who tend not to be careful with things, screen marks easily so would recommend a screen protector, used for watching films and social media, only problem I found was with social media it displayed it very big and cut off the beginning of the page, screen rotation was very annoying. Charge lead Length way too small, so you have to be sat at plug.

I think this tab is great for kids or elderly parents. Its functionality is basic but gives good results. Personally I think the video quality is not the best as can be pixelated but wouldn't be an issue with cartoons etc. Camera takes a lovely picture and is good for kindle books. If you're used to apple or Samsung then you may be left disappointed. But as an entry tab it does the job well and the battery life is great.

This is a great tablet, loads up really fast turns on in like 30 seconds. Has some good apps preloaded like Netflix, Skype and Gmail which is great to occupy and video call family during these times especially. Good camera and screen quality for pictures and watching films is great. Best app I've found so far is the kids zone! My 4.5yr old loves it there's stories that play aloud for them to listen to, ones on there too for older kids to read. Kids games and songs too!

From opening the box, this Android tablet is straightforward to use. Once charged, there are simple instructions to set up, sync with a phone, emails etc.  There are a number of default apps on the home screen and everything else can be found in the Play Store.  It’s easy to navigate, no lag or touch screen issues, parental settings if needed, a fantastic all rounder for any age group. I used daily for a couple hours streaming, general online browsing/shopping, and the battery lasted a week.

The tablet was well packaged, upon opening I was pleasantly surprised at how light and thin the tablet was.
Set up was extremely easy, a few simple taps on the screen and we were good to go. You can link the tablet to your current info such as emails, documents and social media. 
Using the tablet is again very easy to do, self explanatory enough that my young son is able to use it. It has a kids mode and is password enabled. 
The screen is big, the sound quality is great.
A fantastic tablet.

A neat and effective tablet. It has a nano-SIM card slot. It is easy to set up, no problems setting up my e-mail and transferring contacts and apps from my phone. 
Good quality display and auto-rotate screen. 
The quality of pictures and videos taken is excellent as is the playback quality from i-player. Multiple user facility. Battery life approx. 6 hours and about 3 hours to charge.

I’ve had only ever had one brand of tablet in the past And I thought I would never stray from this brand but since having a Lenovo laptop I was excited to try there tablet. I’m very impressed so much that we no longer need the other tablet. It’s super fast to power up, graphics and colours are amazing with plenty of choice of free apps for my son from the play store. Set up was super simple and I love the fact that there is a child account option to keep the children safe while playing.

The size is great, especially as kids are now doing online learning. The sound quality is good but the carema isn't great. Everything you'd expect from an android device. Easily linked to other accounts. Comes with SD card or sim card slot. 16gb memory but most of it is taken up by system files, which is rubbish. Case readily available online.

I was sceptical getting the Lenovo tablet as it’s not a name I associated with quality. I was so wrong. It’s roughly the same size as an iPad but has an android operating system. If your new to android it may take a while to get used too. It’s very quick and responsive and easy to download apps. It feels quite light but I love that about it. Very easy to take out with you for the day or on holiday. The only thing I would say is if you are purchasing this product remember to order a cover.

This tablet was shiny and sleek. Really easy to use and the the instructions were easy to follow. The screen graphics are excellent and watching a film was great, good picture. Searching the internet was quick and easy. This is a brilliant tablet for all ages and easy to use!!!

Very impressed with the quality of the picture. Full HD from a 10.1" screen. To the right  is a standard headphone jack plus a usbc2 port and a micro sd card slot. On the left  are the power and volume buttons while at the bottom is a connector for a dock. With regards to the sound I was impressed. This particluar model has 2gb of ram and 16gb storage.Games run well and the performance is good. 
What I do like is that there are few pre-installed apps, All in all, a very impressive tablet.

Set up is very easy, if you have a google account. Just follow the on-screen prompts.
The screen size is good but the picture quality is not great. Both sharpness and brightness could be better. The cameras are OK for basic use.
It is not very responsive and can be slow to react to screen presses.
The Android OS appears to be bloat free.
I find it to be fine for web browsing and basic tasks.
Overall this is not a bad starter tablet and it would be great for kids.

Very rhin and light
But once done very easy to us
Does not take micro or old type sim card
Good quality camera
Had to copy my mobile to load
Very good visual display
Very robust body
Quick to respond to touch
Excellent sound system
